definition: (bird species of China) brown eared pheasant (Crossoptilon mantchuricum)
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: This paper carried out a preliminary observation on the main diseases of the captive Brown Eared-pheasant at Pangquangou Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 本文對人工飼養褐馬雞的主要疾病進行了研究。
